item.title: DataOps
item.description: Description Purpose Practices DevOps Agile Statistical Process Control Data Lifecycle The Value Pipeline The Innovation Pipeline The Value-Innovation Pipeline Process Development and Deployment Testing Sandbox and test data management Data Lineage and Cataloging Organizational effect Freedom vs. Centralization Competences and Roles Subject-Matter Expert (SME) Data Steward Data Engineer Data Scientist ML Engineer Cloud Engineer References Description DataOps (Data Operations) is a methodology whose goal is to improve the quality and reduce the development lifecycle of data analytics solutions â€“ from ideation to creation of charts, graphs and models that generate value.
